00026 #pragma once
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00029 
00030 namespace L4 {
00035 
00041 class Meta : public Kobject_t<Meta, Kobject, L4_PROTO_META>
00042 {
00043   L4_KOBJECT(Meta)
00044 
00045 public:
00046   enum Op
00047   {
00048     O_num_ifaces = 0,
00049     O_iface      = 1,
00050     O_supports   = 2,
00051   };
00052 
00060   l4_msgtag_t num_interfaces(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw();
00061 
00072   l4_msgtag_t interface(int idx, l4_utcb_t *u = l4_utcb()) throw();
00083   l4_msgtag_t supports(long protocol, l4_utcb_t *u = l4_utcb()) throw();
00084 };
00085 
00088 inline l4_msgtag_t
00089 Meta::num_interfaces(l4_utcb_t *u) throw()
00090 {
00091   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00092   mr->mr[0] = O_num_ifaces;
00093   return l4_ipc_call(cap(), u, l4_msgtag(Protocol, 1, 0, 0),
00094                      L4_IPC_NEVER);
00095 }
00096 
00097 inline l4_msgtag_t
00098 Meta::interface(int idx, l4_utcb_t *u) throw()
00099 {
00100   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00101   mr->mr[0] = O_iface;
00102   mr->mr[1] = idx;
00103   return l4_ipc_call(cap(), u, l4_msgtag(Protocol, 2, 0, 0),
00104                      L4_IPC_NEVER);
00105 }
00106 
00107 inline l4_msgtag_t
00108 Meta::supports(long protocol, l4_utcb_t *u) throw()
00109 {
00110   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00111   mr->mr[0] = O_supports;
00112   mr->mr[1] = protocol;
00113   return l4_ipc_call(cap(), u, l4_msgtag(Protocol, 2, 0, 0),
00114                      L4_IPC_NEVER);
00115 }
00116 
00117 }
